attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To stop being so lapse on sentancing paedophiles, whether just looking at pornography or physical abuse.To ensure life is a life sentance. paedophiles cannot be cured , they need to be permanantly removed from society. To bring about castration for all offenders or be subjected to drugs for life. Since the internet more and more children are being abused and this has got to stop
